mistral.reason: "North by Northwest" is not about Edgar Award-winning works. The Edgar Allan Poe Awards, often abbreviated as the "Edgars," are presented annually by the Mystery Writers of America for the best in mystery fiction published during the previous year. It honors crime and mystery novels, short stories, screenplays, and television episodes, which is a different context than the film "North by Northwest."
